long_description: Designed for the larger tablets on the market, the E-Case eSeries(TM) 18 Case is able to protect a wide range of portable electronic devices, trail maps and ID cards all at the same time. Despite its size, this case is lightweight and ultrathin, perfect for slipping into backpack sleeves or the beach bag. Ultra-clear urethane windows allow full use of touch screens, cameras and audio functions. Every case is individually tested to meet IPX7 standard of withstanding submersion in 1m of water for 30 min. 1-step, waterproof SealLock(TM) zipper and rugged RF-welded seams guarantee protection from the elements. PVC-free materials. E-Case eSeries 18 Case has die-cut lash points for tethering. Fits Amazon Kindle(R) DX, Microsoft Surface(TM), Sony Xperia(TM) Tablet S, Toys R Us TABEO(TM) and other 10 in. tablets. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for the larger tablets on the market, the E-Case eSeries(TM) 18 Case is able to protect a wide range of portable electronic devices, trail maps and ID cards all at the same time.
